evidence.text: EMERGENCY MOTION for Temporary Restraining Order ., MOTION for Preliminary Injunction . Document filed by Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, Transportation Communications Union/IAM. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order Granting Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause Why a Preliminary Injunction Should Not Issue).

extracted.value: Emergency Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, and Transportation Communications Union/IAM on 06/03/2025, seeking a temporary restraining order and a preliminary injunction to halt the Department of Labor’s elimination of the Job Corps program.

evidence.text: MEMORANDUM OF LAW in Support re: 5 EMERGENCY MOTION for Temporary Restraining Order . MOTION for Preliminary Injunction . . Document filed by Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, Transportation Communications Union/IAM.

extracted.value: Memorandum of Law in Support of the Emergency Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, and Transportation Communications Union/IAM on 06/03/2025.

evidence.text: PROPOSED TEMPORARY RESTRAINING ORDER. Document filed by Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, and Transportation Communications Union/IAM.

extracted.value: Proposed Temporary Restraining Order filed by Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, and Transportation Communications Union/IAM on 06/03/2025, proposing a temporary restraining order against the Department of Labor’s elimination of the Job Corps program.

evidence.text: 6 | 2025-06-04 | Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Preliminary Injunction (the “Motion”) to prevent the DOL from closing the 99 private Job Corps centers (the “Private Job Corps Centers”) Dkt. No. 5.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs’ Motion for a Preliminary Injunction filed by the plaintiffs on 06/04/2025 (Dkt. No. 5), seeking to prevent the Department of Labor from closing the 99 private Job Corps centers and to halt the enforcement of contract termination notices and stop work orders.

evidence.text: LETTER MOTION for Leave to File Supplemental Declaration and Notice of Supplemental Authority addressed to Judge Andrew L. Carter, Jr. from AUSA Jean-David Barnea dated 6-16-25. Document filed by Lori Chavez-DeRemer, Department of Labor.

extracted.value: Letter Motion for Leave to File Supplemental Declaration and Notice of Supplemental Authority filed by Defendant Lori Chavez‑DeRemer, Department of Labor on 06/16/2025, seeking the court’s permission to file a Supplemental Declaration and Notice of Supplemental Authority in opposition to Plaintiffs’ preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: MOTION TO INTERVENE BY NON-PARTY JACOB VALINE. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit Exhibit 1).(rro) (Entered: 07/17/2025)

extracted.value: Motion to Intervene by non‑party Jacob Valine filed on 07/17/2025 (Dkt. No. 71), requesting to intervene in the case.

evidence.text: MOTION TO INTERVENE BY NON-PARTY JACOB VALINE. Filed by Jacob Valine. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit 1).(tg) (Entered: 07/22/2025)

extracted.value: Motion to Intervene by non‑party Jacob Valine filed on 07/22/2025 (Dkt. No. 76), again requesting to intervene in the case.
